entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Mm, you seem quite lucid! A rare thing in these times.
I am Logan. I'm a bit cooped up, as you can see.
I have a bright idea. Suppose you set me free?
I'm old and empty-handed, but I could repay you with knowledge, and sorcery.
This place is melting my mind. The inactivity is repressive!
#0Talk-2nd time, after opening his cage using the Cage Key
Oh, heavens, thank you. I'm saved.
And, I'd love to resume my travels,
but I must log a few things first, and I owe you a favour. I will return to Firelink Shrine.
Speak with me there, so that I may impart my sorcery.
#0Talk-3rd time
Oh, hello. Don't mind me. Go on ahead.
I'll be along later. Phoo-hah-hah, I'll be just fine, young one.
#0Talk-1st time with less than 15 Intelligence
Hello there. I was expecting you.
As promised, I will share my sorceries.
I am afraid that you are unable to learn sorcery.
The basic framework, you see. It cannot be taught.
Oh, do not fret. Life isn't all about sorcery. You will find your own way.
Don't frown with regret; peer forward with your head high.
#0Talk-2nd time with less than 15 Intelligence
Hello there. Glad to see you alive.
#0Talk-2nd time with 15 Intelligence or more after previously not enough
Hello there. Glad to see you alive.
Hmm...
It seems you've come quite a way...
Excellent. You are certainly ready. I shall teach you sorceries.
#0Talk-With 15 Intelligence or more-1st time
There you are. I was expecting you.
As promised, I will share my sorceries.
#0Talk-With 15 Intelligence or more-2nd time
Hello there. You really are very diligent.
I quite understand. Study is invigorating!
#0Talk-With 15 Intelligence or more-3rd time
Hello there.
Very well indeed. I'm pleased to share my sorceries.
#0Talk-With 15 Intelligence or more-4th time
Hello there. What have you been up to?
I thought that perhaps you'd gone Hollow on me.
So, have you come to further your study of sorcery?
#0Menu-Choose "Leave"-1st time without purchasing something
No results, eh...
Well, the way of sorceries is a long, hard road. Take it slowly.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave"-2nd time without purchasing something
Farewell.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing something
I will stay here for the time being.
Speak to me again to further your knowledge.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after attaining the Lordvessel
Heading out, are you?
I, too, will leave soon. Undead or no, I shan't stay here forever.
...You have great potential. Don't go and die over nothing.
#0Talk-Before opening his cell with the Archive Tower Giant Cell Key
Hello again! What a chance meeting this is!
Alas, I'm imprisoned once again. I don't suppose you could stage me a getaway?
The Archives, such a storehouse of knowledge. So close, but just out of reach!
The thought offends me so, I could simply die!
As a student of the arts, you understand me, yes?
#0Talk-1st time after opening his cell with the Archive Tower Giant Cell Key
Oh, thank you very much. I'm saved.
That makes twice. I must be sure to repay you.
I will visit the Archives. If I discover any new spells, I shall share them with you.
Prepare to be impressed, by the onward march of sorcery!
#0Talk-2nd time after opening his cell with the Archive Tower Giant Cell Key
Hello. Don't mind me. Go on ahead.
I'll head out soon. I wish to lay down my plans before I visit the Archives.
#0Talk-1st time
Hello there. I was expecting you.
This place is truly magnificent, more than expected, even.
As promised, I shall share the new sorceries with you.
And, the secret of Seath's immortality.
#0Talk-2nd time
Hello there. You really are very diligent.
Oh, I understand. We are in the midst of a revolution!
#0Talk-After resting at a Bonfire
Oh, hello there. Where have you been?
Time is a resource. Let's delve in promptly.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
Ah, the secret of Seath's immortality?
If you have fought him, and were imprisoned, you must know that Seath is a true Undead, different from ourselves.
His wounds close promptly, and no mortal blow affects him, granting true insulation from death.
It is an effect of the Primordial Crystal, a sacred treasure pillaged by Seath when he turned upon the ancient dragons.
So, only by destroying the Primordial Crystal can you so much as scratch his hide.
And it so happens, the Primordial Crystal is in the inner garden of these very archives, the Crystal Forest.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time
The tomes stored in these Archives are truly magnificent.
A great pool of knowledge, the fruits of superior wisdom and an unquenchable desire for the truth.
Some would say Seath had an unsound fixation ...But his work is a beautiful, invaluable resource.
All progress demands sacrifice.
And I certainly bear no antipathy for that wonderful scaleless beast.
#0Talk-After defeating Seath the Scaleless
Oh, there you are, it has been a while.
Or, were you just here?
This fascinating place defeats my sense of time...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after defeating Seath
Mm...mm...
Mm...mm...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after purchasing all of his spells & defeating Seath
...Who are you...
...Stay clear...stay clear of my work...
...Curses upon you!
...How dare you disturb me!
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
Farewell.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave"-1st time after purchasing something
Come again.
The knowledge here is limitless. I will absorb it, then share it with you.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave"-2nd time after purchasing something
Come again, any time you please.
For I too, learn, whilst teaching a student.
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
I fail to see your design,
but if you think I'm too old to defend myself,
perhaps some sorcery will change your mind!
#0Upon dying
Heavens...the folly of youth...
...I'm too old for this...
